text: Streats was an English broadsheet daily newspaper in Singapore, launched on 3 September 2000. It ceased publishing on 1 January 2005 and merged into TODAY. ==History== Streats was launched on 3 September 2000 by Singapore Press Holdings. It was an English broadsheet daily newspaper in Singapore, with the other being Today. On 31 December 2004, Streats was merged into the daily news as a result of SPH and MediaCorp merging free-to-air terrestrial television and newspaper operations. It ceased publishing on Saturday, 1 January 2005 and was renamed to become TODAY, a subsidiary of MediaCorp Press & member of MediaCorp a print media arm. ==References== ==External links== * Streats Online (broken link, Wayback Machine archives) * GetForMe: "Hello 2005; Goodbye Streats" - has a picture of the inaugural issue Category:Newspapers published in Singapore Category:Singapore Press Holdings Category:English- language newspapers published in Asia
title: Streats
